title: 7.3.3 Implement UnusedResourceAnalyzer
body:
## Parent Issue
#31 - 7.3 Cost Analysis Scanner

## Objective
Detect unused resources (unattached EBS, unused EIPs, idle instances).

## Detections
- Unattached EBS volumes
- Unused Elastic IPs
- Idle EC2 instances (CPU < 5%)

## Files to Create
- `src/cloud_optimizer/scanners/cost/unused_analyzer.py`

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Detect unattached volumes
- [ ] Detect unused EIPs
- [ ] Detect idle instances via CloudWatch
- [ ] Calculate savings amounts

## Estimated Time: 3 hours
